sections.heading: of rules.The Nebraska Rules of the Road shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the laws relating to motor vehicles

sections.heading: 39-601 to 39-6,122 do not apply to the users of a hospital drive that does not fit the statutory definition of a "highway" found in section 39-602
sections.text: However, common law rules applicable to users of public ways do apply. Bassinger v. Agnew, 206 Neb. 1, 290 N.W.2d 793 (1980) (pursuant to Laws 1993, LB
